quesions.quesion: What is the correct command to create a new React project?
What does myReactApp refer to in the following command? 'npx create-react-app myReactApp'
quesions.answer-1: The type of app to create
quesions.answer-2: The directory to create the new app in
quesions.answer-3: A reference to an existing app
quesions.answer-4: The name you want to use for the new app
quesions.right-anwser: The name you want to use for the new app
